These are the *prime* factors (excluding two) of the perfect numbers with a Mersenne exponent greater than 60.

61: 3 3 5 5 7 11 13 31 41 61 151 331 1321
87: 3 431 9719 2099863 2932031007403
107: 3 107 6361 69431 20394401 28059810762433
127: 3 3 3 7 7 19 43 73 127 337 5419 92737 649657 77158673929
521: 3 5 5 11 17 31 41 53 131 157 521 1613 2731 8191 61681 51481 409891 42641 858001 7623851 65427463921 145295143558111 173308343918874810521923841 308761441 2400573761 108140989558681 34110701 5746001
607: 3 3 7 607 341117531003194129 7432339208719 845100400152152934331135470251
